title: [SOLVED]820-2914 B "Braindead" but CPU get's hot and has Vcore.
message:
820-2914 came in with what appeared to be no VCORE. Checked PPVCORE_S0_CPU and it was 0.97V.. SPI termination resistors OK as well. PMSLP_S4_L was missing, However I replaced the Clk chip and it was restored. ALLSYS Power Good present. 

**THIS BOARD HAS NO LIQUID DMG** 

The CPU gets hot as well when it is turned on. 

The board does not chime so I doubt it has a gfx chip issue. 

Usb mouse has no light. 

Thanks for any help provided.

title: [SOLVED]820-2914 B "Braindead" but CPU get's hot and has Vcore.
message:
Close thread... GPU dead reheated and worked.... 

And no... I am not one that just senselessly heatguns crap for no reason lol

title: [SOLVED]820-2914 B "Braindead" but CPU get's hot and has Vcore.
message: This is going back as a no fix cause it's going to die
